mapper.insert: insert into order_master (order_id ,buyer_address, buyer_openid, order_amount, order_status, create_time, update_time, sell_id, totalNum) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{buyerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update order_master set buyer_address = #{buyerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_openid = #{buyerOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sell_id = #{sellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalNum = #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, buyer_address, buyer_openid, order_amount, order_status, create_time, update_time, sell_id, totalNum from order_master where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select order_id, buyer_address, buyer_openid, order_amount, order_status, create_time, update_time, sell_id, totalNum from order_master
